content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I suggested using the Google command to search for websites with information on both language learning resources and travel guides. Then, I received a command to write a Python file called "search_tweets.py" to search for tweets with information on language learning resources and travel guides. The file was successfully written to the path "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/search_tweets.py." However, when I was instructed to execute the Python file "authenticate_twitter_api.py," it returned an error saying that the file did not exist. As a solution, I was instructed to write to the file using the command "write_to_file" with the specified filename and text.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/authenticate_twitter_api.py", "text": "# Use Twitter V2 API to authenticate using credentials in file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt\\n\\nimport os\\nimport requests\\n\\nbearer_token = os.environ.get(\\"TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN\\")\\n\\nheaders = {\\n    \\"Authorization\\": f\\"Bearer {bearer_token}\\"\\n}\\n\\nresponse = requests.get(\\"https://api.twitter.com/2/users/2244994945\\", headers=headers)\\n\\nprint(response.json())"}}}'}]
"""
